Interface ec.e.db.RtDecodingManager

public interface RtDecodingManager
extends Object
This interface contains methods that contextually manage decoding objects.

decodeObject(Class, RtDecoder, int)
getUniqueObject(int)
handleMissingParameter(Object, RtDecodingParameters)
Method to implement a policy for what to do when a decode() call discovers a parameter object in the stream but the RtDecodingParameters hashtable is null (i.e.
uniqueImportedObject(Object, int)

decodeObject 
  public abstract Object decodeObject(Class theClass,
                                      RtDecoder coder,
                                      int objectId)
handleMissingParameter 
  public abstract Object handleMissingParameter(Object paramObj,
                                                RtDecodingParameters parameters) throws RtDecodingException
Method to implement a policy for what to do when a decode() call discovers a parameter object in the stream but the RtDecodingParameters hashtable is null (i.e. was not given to decode()) or does not contain the parameter object in question. In both cases this handleMissingParameter() method is called to resolve the problem and is expected to return an object to replace the parameter object.
Parameters:
paramObj - - A parameter object that was decoded from the data stream but that could not be found in the RtDecodingParameters table, if any.
parameters - - The parameter table given to decode(), or null, if none was given.
Returns:
Result - an object that resolves the missing parameter.
getUniqueObject 
  public abstract Object getUniqueObject(int id)
uniqueImportedObject 
  public abstract void uniqueImportedObject(Object object,
                                            int id)
